The really bullshit thing is that he HAD left the table. He literally came over to me on his way out of the pub JUST to yell at me. He wasnâ€™t getting another drink, he wasnâ€™t going to sit back at the table, he just wanted to shout at a girl sitting alone.

At the pub, I sit at the table with two empty glasses & a crumpled paper on it which has been empty for 20 mins. Man comes over, yells that he had been sitting there & tells me to â€œhave some fucking respect.â€ So now Iâ€™m physically shaking and trying not to cry in my local.
